## Multiselect.setOptionContextmenuHandler() method

Set the context menu handler of the multiselect.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setOptionContextmenuHandler(
        onOptionContextmenu: (
            this: Multiselect,
            menu: Menu,
            value: string,
            ctx: MultiselectOptionContextMenuContext
        ) => void
    ): this;
```
